trans-unit.source: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a coordinate pair, a width, a height, and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 绘制由坐标对、 宽度、 高度和两条射线指定的椭圆所定义的扇形。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 此方法绘制由一个椭圆和两条射线相交的一段弧线，与弧的终结点定义的扇形。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle described by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 椭圆的边框所描述由定义`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`参数。

trans-unit.source: The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 扇形包含定义的两条射线`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`参数和之间的交集的射线与椭圆弧。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>它确定颜色、 宽度和样式的扇形。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 定义扇形的椭圆的边框的左上角 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 定义扇形的椭圆的边框的左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 定义扇形的椭圆的边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 定义扇形的椭圆的边框的高度。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 度量的角单位以度为单位从 x 轴到第一条边沿顺时针旋转的扇形。

trans-unit.source: Draws a polygon defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 绘制由一组定义的多边形<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Every pair of two consecutive points in the array specifies a side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的两个连续点的每对指定多边形的边。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the last point and the first point of the array do not coincide, they specify the last side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果最后一个点和数组的第一个点时间不一致，它们指定多边形最后一条边。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>它确定颜色、 宽度和样式的多边形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text string in the specified rectangle with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的指定矩形中绘制指定的文本字符串<xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>和<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The text represented by the `s` parameter is drawn inside the rectangle represented by the `layoutRectangle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的文本`s`所表示的矩形内绘制参数`layoutRectangle`参数。

trans-unit.source: If the text does not fit inside the rectangle, it is truncated at the nearest word.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本不适合该矩形内，则将在最接近的单词被截断。

trans-unit.source: To further manipulate how the string is drawn inside the rectangle use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> overload that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>.
trans-unit.target: 若要进一步操作该矩形内绘制字符串的方式，请使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>重载采用一种<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>。</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Closes the current graphics container and restores the state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the state saved by a call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer*> method.
trans-unit.target: 关闭当前图形容器，并还原此状态<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>到通过调用保存的状态<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer*>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer*>

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method to create nested graphics containers.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法与<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法来创建嵌套的 graphics 容器。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties.
trans-unit.target: 图形容器保留图形状态，例如转换、 剪辑区域和呈现属性。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，保存的状态信息块<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>放置在堆栈上。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>标识该信息块。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying object to the EndContainer method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 当你的标识的对象传递给 EndContainer 方法时，信息块从堆栈中移除，并且用于还原<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>到它所处的时间中的状态<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method several times before you call the EndContainer method.
trans-unit.target: 可以嵌套容器;也就是说，可以调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用 EndContainer 方法之前多次。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 每次调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法，信息块放在堆栈，并且您收到<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>信息块。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the EndContainer method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 当您将其中一种对象到 EndContainer 方法，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>就会归还在<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用返回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>该特定</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>的时间的状态</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 信息块将位于堆栈上的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>从堆栈中，删除方法调用和所有信息块后，该堆栈上都放置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用也将被删除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法相同为对调用堆栈上的位置信息块<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as an EndContainer method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 方法调用与一样 EndContainer 的配对<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法调用配合<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法调用。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the EndContainer method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 EndContainer 方法时，所有信息块将都位于堆栈上 (通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 在相应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>从堆栈中移除方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 同样，当调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法，在堆栈上放置的所有信息块 (通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 在相应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>从堆栈中移除方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref> that represents the container this method restores.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref>表示此方法还原的容器。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to exclude the area specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 此的剪辑区域更新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>以排除指定的区域<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: This method excludes the area specified by the `rect` parameter from the current clip region and assigns the resulting area to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法排除指定的区域`rect`从为当前剪辑区域的参数并将结果区域分配给<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>此<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>属性</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that specifies the rectangle to exclude from the clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>结构，它指定要从剪辑区域排除的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to exclude the area specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此的剪辑区域更新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>以排除指定的区域<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method excludes the area specified by the `region` parameter from the current clip region and assigns the resulting area to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法排除指定的区域`region`从为当前剪辑区域的参数并将结果区域分配给<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>此<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>属性</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> that specifies the region to exclude from the clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>指定要从剪辑区域排除的区域。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填充由一组定义的闭合基数样条曲线的内部<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 此方法填充经过数组中每个点的闭合基数样条的内部。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一个点不匹配的第一个点，则将附加曲线段添加在最后一个点的第一个点，以将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 点的数组必须包含至少四个<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用默认张力 0.5。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of the fill.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>它确定填充特性。

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，这些结构定义样条。

trans-unit.source: brush is .
trans-unit.target: brushis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures using the specified fill mode and tension.
trans-unit.target: 填充由一组定义的闭合基数样条曲线的内部<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>结构使用指定的填充模式和张力。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 此方法填充经过数组中每个点的闭合基数样条的内部。

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一个点不匹配的第一个点，则将附加曲线段添加在最后一个点的第一个点，以将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: 点的数组必须包含至少四个<xref:System.Drawing.Point>结构。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline.
trans-unit.target: `tension`参数确定样条的形状。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`tension`参数为 0.0 f 时，此方法用于绘制直线段连接的点。

trans-unit.source: Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，`tension`参数是否小于或等于 1.0 f。

trans-unit.source: Values over 1.0F produce unusual results.
trans-unit.target: 通过 1.0 f 的值不会生成不寻常的结果。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of the fill.

trans-unit.source: Value greater than or equal to 0.0F that specifies the tension of the curve.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> consists of a series of line and curve segments.

trans-unit.source: If the path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径由表示`path`参数未闭合，添加额外的线段在最后一个点来闭合路径和第一个点。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 填充由指定的椭圆所定义的扇形区的内部<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>结构和两条射线。

trans-unit.source: This method fills the interior of a pie section defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 此方法填充椭圆和两条射线相交的一段弧线，与弧的终结点所定义的扇形区的内部。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 椭圆的边框由定义。

trans-unit.source: The pie section consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 扇形区包含定义的两条射线`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`参数和之间的交集的射线与椭圆弧。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`参数的值大于 360 度或小于-360 度，就像它是 360 度或-360 度，分别处理。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the characteristics of the fill.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that represents the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>结构，它表示定义该扇形的椭圆的边框。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie section.
trans-unit.target: 以度为单位度量的角沿顺时针方向从 x 轴到扇形区第一个边。

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the `startAngle` parameter to the second side of the pie section.
trans-unit.target: 从沿顺时针方向度量的以度为单位的角`startAngle`参数到扇形的第二个端。

trans-unit.source: Fills the interior of a polygon defined by an array of points specified by <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 填充指定的点数组所定义的多边形的内部<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Every two consecutive points in the array specify a side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 每个数组中的两个连续点指定多边形的边。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the last point and the first point do not coincide, they specify the closing side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果最后一个点和第一个点时间不一致，它们将指定多边形的右的端。

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 允许该对象尝试释放资源并在被垃圾回收回收之前执行其他清理操作。

trans-unit.source: Forces execution of all pending graphics operations and returns immediately without waiting for the operations to finish.
trans-unit.target: 强制执行所有挂起的图形操作并立即返回而不等待操作完成。

trans-unit.source: This method starts a flush and returns immediately without waiting for any currently executing graphics operation to finish.
trans-unit.target: 此方法开始刷新，并立即返回，而不必等待任何当前正在执行的图形操作完成。

trans-unit.source: Forces execution of all pending graphics operations with the method waiting or not waiting, as specified, to return before the operations finish.
trans-unit.target: 方法等待或者不等待，将强制执行所有挂起的图形操作按照指定，以返回在操作完成之前。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention> for the `intention` parameter specifies that the method return immediately after beginning the flush, while a value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention> specifies that the method wait before returning until any existing operations finish.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention>为`intention`参数指定该方法返回在开始刷新，而值后立即<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention>指定，该方法在返回之前一直等到所有现有的操作完成。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention>

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the method returns immediately or waits for any existing operations to finish.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention"></xref>枚举，指定方法将立即返回还是等待所有现有的操作完成。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> from the specified handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>从设备上下文的指定句柄。

trans-unit.source: You should always call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> method to release the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and related resources created by the FromHdc method.
trans-unit.target: 始终应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法来释放<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>和相关 FromHdc 方法创建的资源。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even if the display device has an associated ICM color profile, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will not use that profile by default.
trans-unit.target: 即使显示设备具有关联的 ICM 颜色配置文件，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不将默认使用该配置文件。

trans-unit.source: To enable ICM for a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, construct the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> from an HDC after you pass the HDC (and ICM_ON) to the `SetICMMode` function.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用的 ICM <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，构造<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>从 HDC 后 HDC （和 ICM_ON） 传递给`SetICMMode`函数。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Then any drawing done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> will be adjusted according to the ICM profile associated with the display device.
trans-unit.target: 然后通过任何绘图<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>将根据关联到显示设备的 ICM 配置文件调整。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Enabling ICM will result in slower performance.
trans-unit.target: 启用 ICM 将导致性能降低。

trans-unit.source: The state of the device context (mapping mode, logical unit, and the like) at the time you call FromHdc can affect rendering done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 FromHdc 时的设备上下文 （映射模式、 逻辑单元，以及类似的） 的状态可能会影响呈现通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>指定的设备上下文。

trans-unit.source: You should always call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> method to release the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and related resources created by the FromHdc method.
trans-unit.target: 始终应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法来释放<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>和相关 FromHdc 方法创建的资源。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even if the display device has an associated ICM color profile, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will not use that profile by default.
trans-unit.target: 即使显示设备具有关联的 ICM 颜色配置文件，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不将默认使用该配置文件。

trans-unit.source: To enable ICM for a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, construct the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> from an HDC after you pass the HDC (and ICM_ON) to the `SetICMMode` function.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用的 ICM <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，构造<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>从 HDC 后 HDC （和 ICM_ON） 传递给`SetICMMode`函数。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Then any drawing done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> will be adjusted according to the ICM profile associated with the display device.
trans-unit.target: 然后通过任何绘图<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>将根据关联到显示设备的 ICM 配置文件调整。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Enabling ICM will result in slower performance.
trans-unit.target: 启用 ICM 将导致性能降低。

trans-unit.source: The state of the device context (mapping mode, logical unit, and the like) at the time you call FromHdc can affect rendering done by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 FromHdc 时的设备上下文 （映射模式、 逻辑单元，以及类似的） 的状态可能会影响呈现通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>从指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the image has an indexed pixel format, this method throws an exception with the message, "A Graphics object cannot be created from an image that has an indexed pixel format."
trans-unit.target: 如果该图像索引的像素格式，此方法将引发异常，消息，"图形对象无法创建从映像具有索引的像素格式。"

trans-unit.source: The indexed pixel formats are shown in the following list.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表中显示的索引的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> You can save the indexed image as another format by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat%29> method and then retrieve a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for the new image.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>- <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>-<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>你可以通过使用索引的图像保存为另一种格式<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat%29>方法，然后检索<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>新映像的对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat%29> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>

trans-unit.source: This method also throws an exception if the image has any of the following pixel formats.
trans-unit.target: 如果该图像任一以下的像素格式，则此方法还会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> You should always call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> method to release the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and related resources created by the FromImage method.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>- <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>- <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>-<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>都应该调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法来释放<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>和相关 FromImage 方法创建的资源。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat>

trans-unit.source: Gets the cumulative graphics context.
trans-unit.target: 获取累积的图形上下文。

trans-unit.source: The return value is an object array where the first element contains the cumulative clip region and the second element contains the cumulative translate/transform matrix.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是一个对象数组，其中的第一个元素包含累积的剪辑区域，第二个元素包含累积平移/变换矩阵。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the cumulative graphics context.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示累积的图形上下文。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a handle to the current Windows halftone palette.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 Windows 的半色调调色板的句柄。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the GetHalftonePalette method is to enable [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] to produce a better quality halftone when the display uses 8 bits per pixel.
trans-unit.target: GetHalftonePalette 方法的目的是启用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]当显示使用每个像素的 8 位时产生更好的质量半色调。

trans-unit.source: To display an image using the halftone palette, use the following procedure.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示使用半色调调色板的映像，请使用以下过程。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that specifies the handle to the palette.
trans-unit.target: 指定调色板的句柄的内部指针。

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle to the device context associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此关联的设备上下文的句柄<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output.
trans-unit.target: 设备上下文是基于 Windows 结构[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]，它定义一组的图形对象和其关联的属性，以及影响输出的图形模式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns that device context with the exception of a font.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一种字体除了该设备上下文。

trans-unit.source: Because a font is not selected, calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.FromHdc%2A> method using a handle returned from the GetHdc method will fail.
trans-unit.target: 由于没有选中一种字体，调用<xref:System.Drawing.Font.FromHdc%2A>方法使用从 GetHdc 方法返回的句柄将失败。</xref:System.Drawing.Font.FromHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the GetHdc and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> methods must appear in pairs.
trans-unit.target: 调用 GetHdc 和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>方法必须成对出现。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: During the scope of a GetHdc and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> method pair, you usually make only calls to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions.
trans-unit.target: 期间 GetHdc 的作用域和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>方法对，您通常仅对进行调用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error.
trans-unit.target: 调用在该范围内到[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>生成`hdc`参数因`ObjectBusy`错误。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: 此外，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]忽略对所做的任何状态更改<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的`hdc`在后续操作中的参数。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Handle to the device context associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 与此关联的设备上下文的句柄<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the nearest color to the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 获取最接近的颜色指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure for which to find a match.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>为其查找匹配项的结构。

trans-unit.source: A structure that represents the nearest color to the one specified with the color parameter.
trans-unit.target: A 结构，它表示为与指定的最接近的颜色 color 参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interpolation mode associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此关联的插补模式<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The interpolation mode determines how intermediate values between two endpoints are calculated.
trans-unit.target: 内插模式确定如何中间值之间两个终结点进行计算。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 此的剪辑区域更新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>为当前剪辑区域与指定的交集<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: This method assigns to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将分配给<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>此属性<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>表示为当前剪辑区域与由指定的矩形的交集的区域`rect`参数。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure to intersect with the current clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>若要与当前剪辑区域相交的结构。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 此的剪辑区域更新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>为当前剪辑区域与指定的交集<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: This method assigns to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将分配给<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>此属性<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>表示为当前剪辑区域与由指定的矩形的交集的区域`rect`参数。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure to intersect with the current clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>若要与当前剪辑区域相交的结构。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此的剪辑区域更新<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>为当前剪辑区域与指定的交集<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method assigns to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the region specified by the `region` parameter.

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否的可见剪辑区域<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>为空。

trans-unit.source: The visible clipping region is the intersection of the clipping region of this `Graphics` and the clipping region of the window.
trans-unit.target: 可见剪辑区域是此的剪辑区域的交集`Graphics`和窗口的剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the visible portion of the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> is empty; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果这的剪辑区域的可见部分<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>空; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数组<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>对象，其中每个限定在指定字符串内的字符位置的范围。

trans-unit.source: The regions returned by this method are resolution-dependent, so there might be a slight loss of accuracy if strings are recorded in a metafile at one resolution and later played back at a different resolution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的区域与分辨率有关，因此，如果字符串是一种解决方法在图元文件中记录和更高版本播放不同的分辨率可能会略有下降的准确性。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要测量的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>它定义字符串的文本格式。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that specifies the layout rectangle for the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>结构，它指定字符串的布局矩形。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> that represents formatting information, such as line spacing, for the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref>它表示如行距，字符串的格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的数组<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>对象，其中每个限定在指定字符串内的字符位置的范围。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 测量用指定绘制的指定的字符串<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法旨在用于使用与单个字符串和包含少量的额外空间之前和之后要供突出的标志符号的字符串。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>方法调整标志符号点以优化显示质量和可能显示比<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>报告窄字符串</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取适用于在布局中 （例如，实现格式化文本时） 的相邻字符串的度量值，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或之一<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>采用的方法<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，并将传递<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: 另外，请确保<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>为<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要测量的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>它定义字符串的文本格式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the property, of the string specified by the text parameter as drawn with the font parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回结构，它表示的大小，以指定的单位属性，指定的字符串 text 参数绘制 font 参数。

trans-unit.target: fontis .

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> within the specified layout area.
trans-unit.target: 测量用指定绘制的指定的字符串<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>指定的布局区域内。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法旨在用于使用与单个字符串和包含少量的额外空间之前和之后要供突出的标志符号的字符串。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>方法调整标志符号点以优化显示质量和可能显示比<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>报告窄字符串</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取适用于在布局中 （例如，实现格式化文本时） 的相邻字符串的度量值，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或之一<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>采用的方法<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，并将传递<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: 另外，请确保<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>为<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>定义字符串的文本格式。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure that specifies the maximum layout area for the text.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>指定文本的最大布局区域的结构。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the property, of the string specified by the text parameter as drawn with the font parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回结构，它表示的大小，以指定的单位属性，指定的字符串 text 参数绘制 font 参数。

trans-unit.source: font is .
trans-unit.target: fontis .

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 测量用指定绘制的指定的字符串<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The `width` parameter specifies the maximum value of the width component of the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> structure (<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>).
trans-unit.target: `width`参数指定的宽度组件返回的最大值<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF>结构 (<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>)。</xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SizeF>

trans-unit.source: If the `width` parameter is less than the actual width of the string, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> component is truncated to a value representing the maximum number of characters that will fit within the specified width.
trans-unit.target: 如果`width`参数是字符串，将返回的实际宽度小于<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>组件截断为表示的最大适合指定的宽度的字符数的值。</xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: To accommodate the entire string, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> component is adjusted to a value that allows displaying the string with character wrap.
trans-unit.target: 可容纳整个字符串，返回<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A>组件将会调整为一个值，允许显示使用字符换行字符串。</xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法旨在用于使用与单个字符串和包含少量的额外空间之前和之后要供突出的标志符号的字符串。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>方法调整标志符号点以优化显示质量和可能显示比<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>报告窄字符串</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取适用于在布局中 （例如，实现格式化文本时） 的相邻字符串的度量值，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或之一<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>采用的方法<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，并将传递<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置世界单位和此页单位之间的比例<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 此属性指定的世界单位和此页单位之间的比例值<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measure used for page coordinates in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于在此页坐标的度量值的单位<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The graphics unit is the unit of measure used for page coordinates in this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 图形单元是度量的用于此<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>中的页坐标单位

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref> values other than <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref>之外的其他值<xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: PageUnit is set to <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref>, which is not a physical unit.
trans-unit.target: PageUnit 设置为<xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref>，这不是一个物理单元。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value specifying how pixels are offset during rendering of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定像素如何偏移此呈现期间<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify either higher quality, slower rendering, or lower quality, faster rendering of the contents of this<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定此内容的任一更高质量、 低速呈现或质量较低，更快呈现<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PixelOffsetMode"></xref> enumeration
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定的成员<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PixelOffsetMode"></xref>枚举

trans-unit.source: Releases a device context handle obtained by a previous call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*> method of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放通过以前调用获得的设备上下文句柄<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>方法的<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>两种方法，可用于获取和发布 Windows 设备的句柄。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> with a call to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: 你应始终遵循调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>通过调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>完成之后使用的 Windows 句柄。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Releases a device context handle obtained by a previous call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*> method of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放通过以前调用获得的设备上下文句柄<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>方法的<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>

trans-unit.source: The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output.
trans-unit.target: 设备上下文是基于 Windows 结构[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]，它定义一组的图形对象和其关联的属性，以及影响输出的图形模式。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and ReleaseHdc methods must appear in pairs.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>和 ReleaseHdc 方法必须成对出现。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: During the scope of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and ReleaseHdc method pair, you usually make calls only to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions.
trans-unit.target: 期间的作用域<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>和 ReleaseHdc 方法对，你通常会使调用只能与[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error.
trans-unit.target: 调用在该范围内到[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>生成`hdc`参数因`ObjectBusy`错误。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: 此外，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]忽略对所做的任何状态更改<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的`hdc`在后续操作中的参数。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context obtained by a previous call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*> method of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 通过上次调用获得的设备上下文的句柄<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>方法的<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>

trans-unit.source: Releases a handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 释放设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rendering origin of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for dithering and for hatch brushes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此的呈现原点<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>为抵色处理和阴影画笔。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the dither origin for 8-bits-per-pixel and 16-bits-per-pixel dithering and is also used to set the origin for hatch brushes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>结构，它表示 8 位 / 像素和 16 位每像素抖色处理的抖色原点，还用于设置阴影画笔的原点。

trans-unit.source: Resets the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to an infinite region.
trans-unit.target: 重置的剪辑区域<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>为无限区域。

trans-unit.source: When the clipping region of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is infinite, items that this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> draws are not clipped.
trans-unit.target: 时的剪辑区域<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>为无限制，此项<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>不剪切绘制。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Resets the world transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 此世界转换矩阵重置<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>为单位矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The identity matrix represents a transformation with no scaling, rotation, or translation.
trans-unit.target: 标识矩阵表示无缩放、 旋转或平移一个转换。

trans-unit.source: Resetting the world transformation of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the identity matrix means that its world transformation does not change the geometry of transformed items.
trans-unit.target: 重置的世界变换<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>为单位矩阵意味着其世界转换不会更改转换后的项目的几何图形。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Restores the state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the state represented by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 还原此状态<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>到所表示的状态<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，保存的状态信息块<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>放置在堆栈上。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>标识该信息块。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> to theRestore method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 传递时，标识<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>theRestore 方法，该信息块从堆栈中移除与用于还原<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>到它所处的时间中的状态<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法调用。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> returned by a given call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method can be passed only once to the `Restore` method.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>给定调用返回<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法可以一次传递给`Restore`方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method several times before you call the Restore method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法可以嵌套; 也就是说，你可以调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>多次之前调用的还原方法的方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 每次调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法，信息块放在堆栈，并且您收到<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>信息块。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the Restore method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.
trans-unit.target: 当您将其中一种对象<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>返回到<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法调用返回该特定<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState></xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>时的状态</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的还原方法

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 信息块将位于堆栈上的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>从堆栈中，删除方法调用和所有信息块后，该堆栈上都放置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法调用也将被删除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法相同为对调用堆栈上的位置信息块<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as a Restore call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 就像还原调用配合<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>调用，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法调用配合<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the Restore method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 当调用的还原方法时，所有信息块将都位于堆栈上 (通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 在相应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>从堆栈中移除方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 同样，当调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，在堆栈上放置的所有信息块 (通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或通过<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 在相应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>从堆栈中移除方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref> that represents the state to which to restore this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref>表示要还原此状态<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified rotation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的旋转应用于此的变换矩阵<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 旋转操作包括将乘以通过其元素派生自矩阵的转换矩阵`angle`参数。

trans-unit.source: This method applies the rotation by prepending it to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将旋转应用到变换矩阵左乘该通过。

trans-unit.source: Angle of rotation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 以度为单位的旋转角度。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified rotation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的旋转应用于此的变换矩阵<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>指定顺序排序。

trans-unit.source: The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 旋转操作包括将乘以通过其元素派生自矩阵的转换矩阵`angle`参数。

trans-unit.source: This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the rotation matrix according to the `order` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将添加前或追加的变换矩阵<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>通过根据旋转矩阵`order`参数。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Angle of rotation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 以度为单位的旋转角度。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the rotation is appended or prepended to the matrix transformation.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref>指定旋转是追加还是追加到矩阵转换前面的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Saves the current state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and identifies the saved state with a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 保存此的当前状态<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>标识与保存的状态和<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you call the Save method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 当调用 Save 方法的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，保存的状态信息块<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>放置在堆栈上。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The Save method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: Save 方法返回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>标识该信息块。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the Save method call.
trans-unit.target: 传递时，标识<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>到<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法，该信息块从堆栈中移除，并用于还原<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>到状态所处的保存方法调用的时间。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> returned by a given call to the Save method can be passed only once to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>方法可以一次传递给保存给定调用返回<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the Save method can be nested; that is, you can call the Save method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以嵌套调用 Save 方法;也就是说，你可以调用 Save 方法几次你在调用之前<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the Save method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Save 方法中，每次信息块放在堆栈，并且您收到<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>信息块。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the Save method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.
trans-unit.target: 当您将其中一个对象的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>就会归还在返回该特定<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>保存方法调用时的状态</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that Save method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that Save method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: Save 方法从堆栈中，删除调用和所有信息块都放在该堆栈后，保存方法调用，还将删除，信息块将都位于的堆栈上。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the Save method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法相同作为对保存方法的调用堆栈上的位置信息块。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> call is paired with a Save call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 就像<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>配对调用拨打保存<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法调用配合<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法调用。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the Save method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the Save method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法，在堆栈上放置的所有信息块 (通过 Save 方法或<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 从堆栈中移除 Save 方法相应地调用之后。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the Save method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 同样，当调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，在堆栈上放置的所有信息块 (通过 Save 方法或<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 在相应调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>从堆栈中移除方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref> that represents the saved state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref>表示已保存的状态的这<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scaling operation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> by prepending it to the object's transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的缩放操作应用到此转换矩阵<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>通过到对象的变换矩阵左乘该。

trans-unit.source: The scaling operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a diagonal matrix whose elements are (`sx`, `sy`, 1).
trans-unit.target: 在缩放操作包括将乘以其元素的对角矩阵的转换矩阵 (`sx`， `sy`，1)。

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the scaling matrix.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将添加的变换矩阵前<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>通过缩放矩阵。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the x direction.
trans-unit.target: 在 x 方向的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the y direction.
trans-unit.target: Y 方向的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scaling operation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的缩放操作应用到此转换矩阵<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>指定顺序排序。

trans-unit.source: The scaling operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a diagonal matrix whose elements are (`sx`, `sy`, 1).
trans-unit.target: 在缩放操作包括将乘以其元素的对角矩阵的转换矩阵 (`sx`， `sy`，1)。

trans-unit.source: This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the scaling matrix according to the `order` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将添加前或追加的变换矩阵<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>通过根据缩放的矩阵`order`参数。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the x direction.
trans-unit.target: 在 x 方向的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the y direction.
trans-unit.target: Y 方向的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the scaling operation is prepended or appended to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref>指定缩放操作是预置还是追加到转换矩阵的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此的剪辑区域设置<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>到指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the graphics path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果由表示的图形路径`path`参数未闭合，添加额外的线段在最后一个点来闭合路径和第一个点。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that represents the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>它表示新的剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Clip" name="Clip" href=""></xref> property of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此的剪辑区域设置<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>到<xref uid="langword_csharp_Clip" name="Clip" href=""></xref>属性指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> from which to take the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>从中获取新的剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the rectangle specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 此的剪辑区域设置<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>到由指定的矩形<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that represents the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>表示新的剪辑区域的结构。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the rectangle specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 此的剪辑区域设置<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>到由指定的矩形<xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>表示新的剪辑区域的结构。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the result of the specified operation combining the current clip region and the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此的剪辑区域设置<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>到指定的操作组合为当前剪辑区域与指定的结果<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the graphics path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果由表示的图形路径`path`参数未闭合，添加额外的线段在最后一个点来闭合路径和第一个点。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>若要将合并。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies the combining operation to use.
